name: Ultra Bario
description:
3D Runner Platformer Inspired by Super Mario. Shoot enemies, grapple your way through the 3D platform and fight the final BOSS!

It took a week to make, so there is only 1 level.

Control: W A S DMovementSHIFTSprintZCrouchSPACEJumpRIGHT CLICKGrappleLEFT CLICKShootQEnter portalsESCPause Game Model Credits:
